bug.author: julskast
bug.summary: Feedback from hackathon: can't add hackathon code if no org
bug.description: Two players, Ianna and 3382 couldn't add hackathon codes. They're also the only high school student players without an organization. All other students joined hackathons successfully.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/harikmenon>@harikmenon</denchmark-link> did you want this changed? It's a pretty quick fix.
